name: Hearing the Forest
description:
Hearing the Forest is an immersive tree planting experience set in a virtual forest at night. By talking to NPCs in the scene, players get a unique seed for every new conversation and can use these seeds to plant trees. Every tree is unique, even for those that grow from the same seed. Tree planting comes with a chime melody, enhancing the chilling atmosphere.
Hearing the Forest invites players into an interactive, meditative experience where every conversation with an NPC becomes a seed of creativity. With each seed plant, a one-of-a-kind tree blossoms before the player’s eyes, shaped by the magic of L-systems. No two trees are alike—even those grown from the same seed. It’s both a visual and audio experience: as the player plants a tree, a delicate chime melody plays, resonating with the tree growth and adding to the soothing ambiance. It's more than planting a tree — it’s planting a moment of peace.
media: A virtual tree-planting experience, featuring real-time tree pattern generation.

name: Attractiverse-III
description:
Attractiverse-III is an interactive installation that dives into the mesmerizing particle universe. Through a digital screen and MIDI controller, the viewers can experience the magic of mathematical beauty as chaotic randomness transforms into stunning 3D formations with dynamic colors and interactive audio.
Attractiverse-III was featured at MY _____ IS AN ECOSYSTEM exhibition on Governors Island.
media: A real-time point cloud evolution system controlled by physical interface, powerful tool for pattern generation and live performance.

name: Tree of Growth
description:
Inspired by L-systems, known for their flexible and customizable descriptions of recursive patterns, Tree of Growth is an interactive projection that brings the art of tree planting to life. The installation invites participants to plant and grow their own unique trees in a virtual garden, simply by positioning a red box on the floor. Every tree is distinct, reflecting nature’s diversity, powered by recursive mathematical rules.
This is a collaboration between Fuguo Xue and Jinyuan Liu.
media: A physical interactive tree-planting experience. Grow a digital tree with a physical block.

name: The Surface City
description:
Urban planning throughout history is often closely related to its geographical location and culture. In a world where information technology is increasingly developed, people have less and less privacy. What would a city without privacy be like? The Surface City poetically explores this question.
The project consists of the story of The Surface City, and a web-based interactive experience that allows player to generate 3D cityscapes of several Surface City districts. 
The Surface City is a collaboration between Fuguo and Chenyi. It is part of the Visible Cities: Workshop Exhibition organized by CritLab Review.
media: An experimental fiction about a society without privacy, accompanied by interactive conceptual visuals imagining the society's urban planning realized by programming.

name: WildWeb
description:
WildWeb is an interactive installation that visualizes the recording of people’s digital and physical footprints in this era of pervasive information technology, and how technology digests the data to generate endless content.
This installation was designed and developed by me and Sauda Musharrat.
media: A physical interactive installation reflecting on our digital and physical footprints, and their conversion into endless content on social media.

name: AquaMetropolis
description: AquaMetropolis: A Submerged Cyberpunk Odyssey is a short fictional film produced with Generative AI by Fuguo Xue that transports viewers into a mesmerizing undersea world. In this visionary future, humanity has adapted to life beneath the waves as sea levels rise. While the city appears harmonious, the film subtly reveals the profound vulnerability and awe that humans experience when faced with the relentless power of the natural world.
media: A short fictional film produced with Generative AI, imagining a city under the sea.

name: Cometale
description:
Cometale is an interactive installation that creates a unique and engaging experience, highlighting the interconnectedness of history and nature by combining ancient and modern elements. By developing this installation, I hope to offer visitors a chance to reflect on the historical events, and how they continue to shape our understanding of the world around us today.
Cometale was featured at the Ars Electronica Festival 2023 Campus Exhibition.
media: A physcial interactive installation about a silk scroll recording ancient Chinese astronomical divination.

name: NYC Subway Navigation
description:
NYC Subway Navigation is a UX Design Research Project aiming at improving the subway navigation experience of NYC subway users. Developed by our team of four, the final intervention focuses on improving the in-station signage of NYC subways.
We first did a brainstorming session to create a mess map about subway navigation. Then, we conducted secondary research to determine the scope of our intervention and updated our mess map based on knowledge from secondary research. Next, we conducted primary research including transect tours and interviews to gain deeper insights into our stakeholders. Finally, we ideated and prototyped a new NYC subway in-station signage index system, gathered feedback from A/B testing, and did one iteration over our intervention.
This project was done by Cassandra Mao, Chenyi Wang, Fuguo Xue, and Hanwen Gu.
media: UX design in Figma, with A/B testing and an interation.

name: Earthlings
description:
Earthlings is a two-player 2.5D environment game that promotes ecological awareness by encouraging cooperation in the game. By developing this game, we hope to prompt our players to think about the relationship between humans and nature.
I contributed to this game in terms of game conception, game programming, and art assets creation.
Our team of 3 (Fuguo Xue, Xinying Guo, and Yaoxuan Wang) presented this game at The International Conference of Undergraduate Research 2022 (ICUR 2022).
media: A two-player cooperative game that requires collaboration between players to collect magic stones and successfully retreat from a forest on fire.

name: Eclipse Tracer
description:
Eclipse Tracer is a 3D game about the Solar Eclipse that happened in April 2024, which is a collaboration of Ziye Zhang, Zhuoyuan Li, Shiqi Wang, and Fuguo Xue.
This project was built during a 2-day game jam supported by The National Esports Association, Epic Games, and NASA.
media: A 3D maze game in which the player navigates through a maze consisting of four scenes connected by hidden teleporters in order to reach the best spot to appreciate the eclipse.

name: Bones
description:
Bones is a relaxing 3D PC game. In the low-poly scene filled with beautiful flowers, grass, fungus, and trees, the corgi wants to meet his friends and collect as many bones as possible along the way.
This is a collaboration between Man Ding and Fuguo Xue.
media: A 3D collection game in which a corgi, controlled by the player, navigates the beautiful forest to collect as many bones as possible in limited time.

name: Synthetica Boletus
description:
Synthetica Boletus is an interactive experience of immersion into the world of synthetic boletus in which our existence reflects the mortality of the mysterious creatures.
This interactive experience was created by group of 6. I led the 3D scene design in Unity3D.
media: virutal environment built with Unit3D and physical sensing system built with Arduino and OSC.

name: SwipeX
description:
"SwipeX: News on the Go" is a mobile web feature that provide effective news reading reading experience in bite-sized summaries. It aims to:
1. Pique curiosity – it delivers news in summaries to make news reading more productive.
2. Personalization – It learns readers’ reading habits and topics of interest and pushes news that may be of interest to them.
In our team of 8, I co-developed the front-end of SwipeX and co-designed the UI and logo of SwipeX.
This project is supported by NTU News Media Lab.
media: mobile web feature built with React.js.

name: Cat Jazz
description: Cat Jazz is an experimental animation that combines jazz music and abstract animation to present the imagery of cats. Different from traditional animation's reliance on concrete characters, this experimental animation uses the automatic audio-visual synchronization mechanism of the human brain to complete the storytelling.
media: experimental animation created with Adobe After Effects.
